title: Mozilla Thunderbolt újra telepítése
content: A laptopomon a Mozilla Thunderbolt levelezés eddig rendben működött, de nem tudom, hogy mi történt vele, de az e-maileket egyszer csak nem tudta letölteni, és e-mailt sem tudtam küldeni, mert valamilyen szerver kapcsolódási hibát jelzett. Egy másik laptomon, és a mobilomon viszont minden rendesen működik. Megpróbáltam, hogy kitörlöm a Win11-ben a programok eltávolítása helyen a programot, és újra telepítem, hátha ez segít. A Mozilla Thunderbolt újra telepítése után, amikor a régi fiókot vissza akarom állítani, és beírom a szükséges adatokat, előbb azt írja ki, hogy megtalálta a létező fiókot (konfigurációt), rányomok hogy Kész, és ekkor viszont azt írja ki, hogy vagy rossz a konfiguráció, vagy rossz a felhasználó név, vagy rossz a jelszó. A felhasználó név, és jelszó biztosan jó, és ezért nem értem, hogy mi lehet a baj a konfigurációval, hogy nem tölti be a létező fiókomat. Ebben kérnék ötletet, segítséget, hogy mi lehet a baj, és mit kellene csinálnom?
creator: lajos.willingsdorfer

title: Synch message deletion between Thunderbird and Android phone email client
content:
Until about a month ago, this was working perfectly: whenever I would delete an email message on my cell phone that action would be passed along automatically and update my Thunderbird desktop account.

And now it isn't working any more. So I have to delete unwanted messages twice. And I get a lot of messages.

Please tell me if you know of any system changes that may have cause this setup to stop working, and if possible, how I might restore this key functionality. Thanks!

title: Thunderbird Thread
content:
I just pressed Enter and the whole topic disappeared. Why? Why do you do this? This is my whole subject: Why do you do your things automatically, when I try to do manually? You have a great EMAiL-software: Thunderbird. Why do you want to screw it and the user? Computer usage should be reliable. I have lost so many EMAiLs since you broke the EMAiL paths logic with threads. Why? Why did you want to make it complicated? I had a good filing system with Thurnerbird for years. Why did you have to break it? Why didn't you even make it optional, but mandatory?

How can I get the old EMAiL-filing back without the Thread-Paths? Please help!

I didn't ask this immediately, but during the years, I have lost so many important EMAiLs (again today), that now I ask.
creator: Mozilla724

title: Přeposlaná zpráva
content: Mám prosbu, pokud přepošlu nebo odpovím na zprávu, tak se zobrazí šipka. Kde zjistím komu jsem přeposílal zprávu? Pokud si označím přepnout vlákna zpráv naskočí vedle znaku přeposlaná zpráva šipka a tou si rozkliknu vlakno. Toto se ale děje u větší komunikace, ale pokud jen odpovím nebo přepošlu jednu zprávu nikde nemohu rozklinknout komunikaci. Ve starší verzi to bylo v nabídce pod pravým tlačítkem myši. Poradíte?

title: Account settings changes required by email host
content:
My email host requires changes to connection settings (this is for an existing account), specifically to increase security but also specifying new incoming and outgoing server names.

I have meticulously copied the settings provided by the host for this purpose but Thunderbird will not (cannot?) connect to the server.

Thunderbird is not asking for my password, nor does the password appear in TB's 'Saved Passwords'.

So I tried 'Add Mail Account', entered all the new settings manually, but TB responds 'Incoming server already exists' (presumably because I had already changed the existing account settings?) - see screenshot.

Should I remove the existing account before trying 'Add Mail Account'? Although that would seem unlikely to work, since the existing account with the new settings does not connect.

Support from my email (and broadband) host has been practically useless, so I thought I would ask the wonderful brains on TB forum if they can give me any clue as to where things are going wrong?

title: Thunderbird non risponde
content: Ciao Ragazzi, da qualche settimana il mio Thunderbird, ver. 137.0.1 (64 bit) installato su Windows 10, di punto in bianco dopo qualche minuto dall'apertura non risponde. Ho provato ogni cosa che ho trovato nel form di cui mi sono accorto, ma niente da fare. Il problema è che non riesco nemmeno ad arrivare al pannello tramite il quale inviare la segnalazione, perché si blocca prima punto e basta. Non so veramente più come uscirne, ed il solo pensiere di dover ri-configurare tutte le caselle (oltre 35) come ultimo tentativo, mi vien male. Avete qualche suggerimento da darmi? Come posso riscontrare il problema e darvi maggiori info? Grazie.
